INPUT-OPTIONS.INPUT_FILE: Input file (R): Uses this file as the main FEB file.
INPUT-OPTIONS.FEB_FILE: Feb file (OR): Same as input file, but will replace it if both are given.
INPUT-OPTIONS.INPUT_FOLDER: Input folder (OR): Finds all feb inside the given directory. Will overwrite input file or feb file if given.
INPUT-OPTIONS.OUTPUT_FOLDER: Output folder (O): Where the output file should be written. Default uses same directory as input folder.
INPUT-OPTIONS.PROPERTIES_FOLDER: Properties folder (O): Folder containg properties to add to feb. Properties must be xml files.
INPUT-OPTIONS.SELECTED_PROPERTIES: Selected properties (O): A string containg selected properties to include. To select all use -all-.
INPUT-OPTIONS.EXCLUDE_PROPERTIES: Exclude properties (O): A string containg selected properties to exclude.
INPUT-OPTIONS.FIBERS_DATA_FOLDER: Fibers data folder (O): Folder containg the fibers csv data files.

ADD_PROPERTIES.short: Adds selected properties to a given FEB.

ADD_FIBERS.short: Adds fibers data to a feb file.

CREATE_LOADCURVE.short: Creates a load curve using FEB format (written in a xml file).

ADD_LOAD.short: Add Loads and LoadData to a given feb file.

EXTRACT_GEOMETRY_DATA.short: Extract the geometry data (nodes and elements) from a given feb file.
EXTRACT_GEOMETRY_DATA.long:
This command is used to extract the geometry data (nodes and elements) from a given feb file. 
It saves nodes and elements in seperate files in a .csv format where the first colum is the node or element id and the following columns are the geometry data.

CALCULATE_FIBERS.short: Calculates fiber orientation of a myocardium geometry.
CALCULATE_FIBERS.long: This command is used to calculate the fibers of a generic myocardium geometry. It uses MATLAB to compute the fiber orientation and saves the output on a fibers data file.

PREPARE.short: Prepares and executes a mesh study. Can also be used to do a parametric study with fiber orientation.

RUN_FEB.short: Runs an feb file or all files in sub-folder of an input folder.

CREATE_STORAGE_FOLDER.short: Creates the main folders of a study storage.

MODIFY_PARAMETER.short: Modifies given parameters of a feb file.

MAKE_PICKLE.short: Makes a pickle from a colection of result files.
